function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Identifying dangerous areas using heat maps can create a false sense of security if not accompanied by accurate and up-to-date data on contagious disease spread.","Impact":"People may unknowingly travel through high-risk areas, increasing the likelihood of exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Ensure the heat maps are based on real-time data and public health information to accurately reflect the current risk of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Real-time data tracking, AI algorithms for contagion risk assessment.","People":"Users, school staff, students, and community members.","Owner":"Public health authorities, app developers, data analysts."},{"Description":"Calculation of routes based solely on distance without considering contagious disease risk levels can lead to increased exposure to high-risk areas.","Impact":"Users may be directed through dangerous areas, increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Incorporate contagion risk models into route calculation algorithms to prioritize safer paths over shorter distances.","Technologies":"Contagion risk modeling, geospatial analysis, route optimization algorithms.","People":"Users, school staff, students, and community members.","Owner":"App developers, public health authorities, transportation planners."},{"Description":"The service may fail to adequately communicate the limitations of safe routes and the possibility of unavoidable exposure to dangerous areas.","Impact":"Users may falsely assume that following designated safe routes guarantees avoidance of high-risk areas, leading to complacency and increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and transparent information on the limitations of safe routes and the potential for exposure to dangerous areas despite route optimization.","Technologies":"User interface design, clear communication strategies.","People":"Users, school staff, students, and community members.","Owner":"App developers, public health authorities, communication specialists."}]}
